scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Nativity within a Gothic architectural framework. In the foreground, the Virgin Mary, clad in a blue robe, cradles the Christ Child in a manger. To the right, Saint Joseph kneels in prayer. Behind them, a donkey and an ox are visible, their heads bowed. The background features rolling hills and a stylized landscape, with the sky rendered in a vibrant blue. The architectural elements, including pointed arches and ornate tracery, frame the scene, suggesting a divine or sacred setting.
